about_the_game:
Get the ultimate content for Year 11 and beyond with the new SMITE Deluxe Legacy Pass!

Get instant access to the very first Cross-Gen SMITE 2 Skins: Untamed Bellona and Baddie Bat Jing Wei.

Plus, boost your Divine Legacy progress with a Year 11 Match Points Booster to earn even more Cross-Gen content as you play all year long!

You'll receive all of the following contents:

- SMITE Ultimate God Pack (unlocks all 130 Gods)
- "Barbarian" Title (Cross-Gen)
- Untamed Bellona Avatar (Exclusive)
- Year 11 New Goddess: Nut
- Nut Voice Pack & Emotes (Wave & Clap)
- Ascended Skin for Nut
- The Cosmos Skin for Nut
- Divine Legacy Booster
- 1000 Gems

If you've previously purchased gods with favor or gems, you will be refunded the favor cost upon purchase of the Year 11 Deluxe Legacy Pass.
Cross-Gen refer to SMITE & SMITE 2. Contents labeled as "Cross-Gen" will be available in both SMITE & SMITE 2.

Divine Legacy booster only applies to points gained from match hours in Year 11

Get instant access to the very first Cross-Gen SMITE 2 Skins: Untamed Bellona and Baddie Bat Jing Wei.

Plus, boost your Divine Legacy progress with a Year 11 Match Points Booster to earn even more Cross-Gen content as you play all year long!

name: SMITE Legacy Deluxe Pass

subs.option_text: SMITE Year 11 Legacy Deluxe Edition - $59.99 USD

short_description: Get the ultimate content for Year 11 and beyond with the new SMITE Deluxe Legacy Pass! Plus: immediately unlock two Cross-Gen skins and boost your Divine Legacy progress with a Year 11 Match Points Booster to earn even more Cross-Gen content as you play all year long!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
